response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in achieving unparalleled results. Considering its quality, functionality, and the benefits it offers, we believe it's worth more than $15,000 to you. For this unique opportunity, I am offering you the chance to acquire it at a special introductory price of $18,000. This is an exclusive offer designed to ensure you receive the best value possible. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our product. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 18000}
